ColumnSum.KitText: #> ColumnSum AccountBalance --print --exampleTitle Compute Sum of a Single Column --example Summing the values in a single numeric column gives a quick understanding of total magnitude. In this example, we compute the sum of the AccountBalance column and print the result. This can be used for reporting, summaries, or validation checks.
ColumnSum.ExampleDescription: Summing the values in a single numeric column gives a quick understanding of total magnitude. In this example, we compute the sum of the AccountBalance column and print the result. This can be used for reporting, summaries, or validation checks.
ColumnSum.ExampleTitle: Compute Sum of a Single Column
